note.p: Birth: Great Ormond Street, London, England (29 April 1774)
Death: Great Ormond Street, London (31 March 1858)
Career: Studied for the Bar; one of the original promoters of the Royal Institution; helped to found the Geological and Horticultural Societies
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1857-1859 vol 9 pp 549-550
Notes: Venn and Boase give birth date as 29 April 1774, but note in BR index states 'year appears wrong as he was 17 in 1796'.
